db:abstract.db:para: The Axis element is used for manipulating chart's axes.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Axis can be setup to show axis line with tick marks, grid lines and shades. Categories are drawn between ticks. Note that you can use this also with lineseries too.
To access BarCategoryAxis you can use ChartView API. For example:

db:section.db:title: max : string
db:section.db:para: Defines the maximum value on the axis.

db:section.db:title: min : string
db:section.db:para: Defines the minimum value on the axis.

db:section.db:title: onCountChanged()
db:section.db:para: Axis emits signal when the count of categories has changed.

db:section.db:title: onMaxChanged(const QString &max)
db:section.db:para: Axis emits signal when max of axis has changed.

db:section.db:title: onMinChanged(const QString &min)
db:section.db:para: Axis emits signal when min of axis has changed.

db:section.db:title: void clear()
db:section.db:para: Removes all categories. Sets the maximum and minimum of the axis's range to QString::null.
